SEARCH
Package pokerGame

Class PokerLogic

java.lang.Object
pokerGame.PokerLogic
public class PokerLogic extends Object
Version:
January 6 2024 Class simulate's the ENTIRE game's poker logic. It has auxiliary methods that evaluates 5,6, and 7 card hands. in addition to that it has methods that ACTUALLY evaluate those hands, and identify what kind of hands they are. Lastly, it has ALOT of helper methods that help getting information on the deck/cards
Author:
Patrick Christmas

    • evaluateSixCardHand

      public static String evaluateSixCardHand(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      evaluates the best hand from a 6-card hand by considering all possible 5-card combinations
      Parameters:
      cards - the list of 6 cards to evaluate
      Returns:
      the rank of the best 5-card hand from the 6 cards
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input does not contain exactly 6 cards

    • evaluateHand

      public static String evaluateHand(ArrayList<Card> holeCards, ArrayList<Card> communityCards)
      evaluates the best possible hand for a player given their cards and community cards
      Parameters:
      holeCards - the player's cards
      communityCards - the shared community cards
      Returns:
      the rank of the best 5-card hand as a string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the combined cards are fewer than 5
